title: Voxel Buffer
description: A buffer is a binary blob. It is either the binary chunk of the voxel file, or an external buffer referenced by a URI.

uri.description: The URI (or IRI) of the external schema file. Relative paths are relative to the file containing the buffer JSON. `uri` is required when using the JSON voxel format and not required when using the binary voxel format - when omitted the buffer refers to the binary chunk of the voxel file. Data URIs are not allowed.

byteLength.description: The length of the buffer in bytes.
